select * from (select rownum rn, ap_form_name, ap_doc_no, ap_doc_title, user_name as ap_Doc_Writer_Name, ap_doc_writer,ap_doc_project_name, ap_doc_createdate, ap_doc_enddate , ap_doc_status from (select f.ap_form_name, d.ap_doc_no, d.ap_doc_title, u.user_name, d.ap_doc_writer, d.ap_doc_project_name, d.ap_doc_createdate, d.ap_doc_enddate , d.ap_doc_status from approvaldoc d join approvalform f on d.ap_form_no = f.ap_form_no join users u on d.ap_doc_writer = u.user_id join approval a on d.ap_doc_no = a.ap_doc_no where (ap_doc_writer = #{userId} or a.ap_approver = #{userId}) and ap_doc_status = 1
order by ap_doc_status desc, ap_doc_no) where rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} -1) * #{cri.amount}
select NVL(count(*),0) from approval a where a.ap_approver = #{apDocWriter} and a.ap_step = (select ap_doc_step from approvaldoc where ap_doc_no = a.ap_doc_no)
select count(*) from approvaldoc where ap_doc_no in (select ap_doc_no from approvalreferrer where ap_referrer = #{apReferrer}) and ap_doc_status in (0,1,2)

order by ap_doc_no) where rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} -1) * #{cri.amount}
select d.*, u.user_name as ap_doc_writer_name from approvaldoc d join (select user_id, user_name from users) u on u.user_id = d.ap_doc_writer where d.ap_doc_no = #{apDocNo}
